Package com.gradview.data.dts

Class UserDTS

java.lang.Object
com.gradview.data.dts.UserDTS
@Service public class UserDTS extends Object
Accesses and interacts with the "users" table.
Author:
Charles Davis

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<UsersDAO> getAllUsers() throws NoRowsFoundException, org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Retrieves all users from the "users" table.
      Returns:
      The list of all users from the "users" table.
      Throws:
      NoRowsFoundException - There were no users found in the "users" table.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - See message for reason for exception.

    • search

      public List<UsersDAO> search​(String column, String query) throws NoRowsFoundException, org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Searches for users in the requested column for the query in the "users" table.
      Parameters:
      column - - The column to search for the query in.
      query - - The value to search in the column for.
      Returns:
      A list of users that meet the requested criteria.
      Throws:
      NoRowsFoundException - There were no users found in the "users" table.
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - See message for reason for exception.

    • create

      public boolean create​(UsersDAO user) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Adds the inputed user to the "users" table.
      Parameters:
      user - - The user to add to the "users" table.
      Returns:
      Status of creation. True: user was added to the "users" table. False: User was NOT added to the database.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An issue occurred, user was not created.

    • update

      public boolean update​(UsersDAO user) throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
      Updates the user in the database using the user's id to select database entry to update.
      Parameters:
      user - - The user to update the database with.
      Returns:
      Status of update. True: UsersDAO was updated. False: UsersDAO was NOT updated.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - An issue occurred, UsersDAO was not updated.
